title: Peanut Butter and Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['175g butter', '100g caster sugar', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '85g peanut butter', '60ml water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '160g porridge oats', '170g plain chocolate chips']
